intro: Gaertnera rigida, commonly known as the rigid gaertnera, is a flowering plant native to the Andean regions of South America. It is a member of the Rubiaceae family, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its woody stems and opposite, ovate leaves with a leathery texture. It produces small, white or pale yellow flowers that are clustered in inflorescences. Gaertnera rigida is typically found in humid, shaded environments at higher elevations.
